Ability Learnset

By leveling up

Level Ability Cost Description
1 Blaze 13 Powers up Fire-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.
1 Magma Armor 11 The Pokémon is covered with hot magma, which prevents it from becoming frostbitten.
10 Guts 61 It's so gutsy that having a status condition boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat.
25 Flame Body 27 Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.
40 Dry Skin 27 Rain and Water-type moves restore HP. Sunlight and Fire-type damage hurt more.
55 Oblivious 11 The Pokémon is oblivious, and that keeps it from being infatuated or taunted.
70 Strong Jaw 29 The Pokémon's strong jaw boosts the power of its biting moves.
85 Reckless 33 Powers up moves that have recoil damage.
100 Calderize 68 Normal-type moves become Fire-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By Disc

Disc Ability Cost Description
Disc 07 Illuminate 11 Raises the Pokémon's evasiveness.
Disc 11 Ball Fetch 0 If the Pokémon is not holding an item, it will fetch the first failed thrown Poké Ball.
Disc 14 Flash Fire 25 Powers up the Pokémon's Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.
Disc 18 Mimicry 12 Changes the Pokémon's type depending on the terrain.
Disc 35 Strong Jaw 29 The Pokémon's strong jaw boosts the power of its biting moves.
Disc 44 Magma Armor 11 The Pokémon is covered with hot magma, which prevents it from becoming frostbitten.
Disc 50 Oblivious 11 The Pokémon is oblivious, and that keeps it from being infatuated or taunted.
Disc 56 Rough Skin 20 This Pokémon inflicts damage with its rough skin to the attacker on contact.
Disc 59 Stamina 28 Boosts the Defense stat when hit by an attack.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By tutoring

Ability Cost Description
Anger Point 27 The Pokémon is angered when it takes a critical hit, and that maxes its Attack stat.
Anticipation 1 The Pokémon can sense an opposing Pokémon's dangerous moves.
Blaze 13 Powers up Fire-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.
Calderize 68 Normal-type moves become Fire-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Cold-Blooded 49 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in harsh sunlight.
Competitive 27 Boosts the Sp. Atk stat sharply when a stat is lowered.
Defeatist -54 Halves the Pokémon's Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.
Drought 75 Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Dry Skin 27 Rain and Water-type moves restore HP. Sunlight and Fire-type damage hurt more.
Flame Body 27 Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.
Guts 61 It's so gutsy that having a status condition boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat.
Heatproof 2 The heatproof body of the Pokémon halves the damage from Fire-type moves that hit it.
Immunity 11 The immune system of the Pokémon prevents it from getting poisoned.
Inner Focus 11 The Pokémon's intensely focused, and that protects the Pokémon from flinching.
Klutz -39 The Pokémon can't use any held items.
Marvel Scale 3 The Pokémon's marvelous scales boost the Defense stat if it has a status condition.
Multiscale 69 Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full.
Pickup 1 The Pokémon may pick up the items, both during and outside of battle.
Reckless 33 Powers up moves that have recoil damage.
Slow Start -75 For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.
Stall -27 The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.
Stalwart 11 Ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon's Abilities and moves that draw in moves.
Stench 2 By releasing stench when attacking, this Pokémon may cause the target to flinch.
Super Luck 53 The Pokémon is so lucky that the critical-hit ratios of its moves are boosted.
Truant -74 The Pokémon can't use a move if it had used a move on the previous turn.
Unaware 60 When attacking, the Pokémon ignores the target Pokémon's stat changes.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled
